DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy ABT-719 prevent acute kidney injury patient undergoing high risk cardiac surgery .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Trial Multiple Dosing Regimens ABT-719 Prevention Acute Kidney Injury Subjects Undergoing High Risk Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subject must male female , age great equal 18 year old . Subjects must stable renal function , per Investigator discretion know increase serum creatinine great equal 0.3 mg precede 4 week . Subjects estimate glomerular filtration rate le equal 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 require intravascular iodinate contrast within 48 hour day surgery , include know serum creatinine increase great equal 0.3 mg . Subjects must undergo predefined onpump cardiac surgery meet one follow acute kidney injury risk factor : Subject undergoing combine coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) surgery surgery one cardiac valve ( valve ( ) surgery ) , Subject undergo surgery one cardiac valve ( valve surgery ) , Subject undergoing surgery aortic root ascend part aorta , Subject undergoing surgery aortic root ascend part aorta , combine coronary artery bypass graft and/or valve ( ) surgery , Subject estimate glomerular filtration rate great equal 16 mL/min/1.73 m2 less equal 59 mL/min/1.73 m2 determine Chronic Kidney Disease Epidemiology Collaboration ( CKD EPI ) formula Screening , undergo coronary artery bypass graft single valve surgery . Has eGFR less equal 15 mL/min/1.73 m2 . Cardiac surgery perform without cardiopulmonary bypass . Has ongoing sepsis history sepsis within last 2 week untreated diagnosed infection prior Screening visit . Sepsis define presence confirm pathogen , along fever hypothermia , hypoperfusion hypotension . Has know document RIFLE `` R '' AKIN `` Stage I '' within previous 4 week . Recently receive ( within last 10 week ) anticipate receive chemotherapy interfere kidney function
